Sacramento.The Art Institute of California \u2013 S:
The Art Institute of California – Sacramento is a nonprofit institution owned and operated by Dream Center Education Holdings (DCEH), LLC which provides degree programs in design, media arts, fashion and culinary arts.
Established in 2007, The Art Institute of California – Sacramento is a branch of The Art Institute of California – Los Angeles and is one of eight locations of The Art Institutes system located within California. Located in Sacramento, California, The Art Institute of California – Sacramento is accredited by the Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools (ACICS).
